body:
* Change the version to apply patches.
Fixes of adition Fujitsu compiler is involved in version 1.20.0. So, I fixed to apply add_fj_compiler.patch only up to version 1.19.5.

* Change the name of the Fujitsu compiler to 'fujitsu' in numpy.
In upstream of `numpy`, Setting name of Fujitsu compiler is `fujitsu`. So, I changed the setting name of the Fujitsu compiler used in the patch of `py-numpy` and the setting value of `config_fc` specified in `py-scipy`.

Fixes #21482
title: py-numpy: Fix for new version of numpy with Fujitsu compiler.
